chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
K: AbsRing
V: NormedModule K
U: NormedModule K
g: U -> V
f: U -> V
x: UniformSpace.sort U

Goal:
locally x (fun y : U => f y = g y) -> ex_filterdiff f (locally x) -> ex_filterdiff g (locally x)

Premises:
Notation UniformSpace := UniformSpace.type
locally = fun (T : UniformSpace) (x : T) (P : T -> Prop) => exists eps : posreal, forall y : T, ball x eps y -> P y : forall T : UniformSpace, T -> (T -> Prop) -> Prop Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [_ _ function_scope]
ex_filterdiff = fun (f : U -> V) (F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop) => exists l : U -> V, filterdiff f F l : (U -> V) -> ((U -> Prop) -> Prop) -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope function_scope]
Notation NormedModule := NormedModule.type
AbelianGroup.sort = fun t : AbelianGroup => let (sort, _, _) := t in sort : AbelianGroup -> Type AbelianGroup.sort is a coercion
filterdiff_ext_locally = fun (f g : U -> V) (x : U) (l : U -> V) (H : locally x (fun y : U => f y = g y)) => filterdiff_ext_loc f g l H (fun (y : U) (Hy : is_filter_lim (locally x) y) => match H with | @ex_intro _ _ d Hd => Hd y (let H0 : x = y := is_filter_lim_locally_unique x y Hy in eq_ind x (fun y0 : U => ball x d y0) (ball_center x d) y H0) end) : forall (f g : U -> V) (x : U) (l : U -> V), locally x (fun y : U => f y = g y) -> filterdiff f (locally x) l -> filterdiff g (locally x) l Argument scopes are [function_scope function_scope _ function_scope _ _]
ex_filterdiff_ext_loc = fun (F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop) (FF : Filter F) (f g : U -> V) (H : F (fun y : U => f y = g y)) (H0 : forall x : U, is_filter_lim F x -> f x = g x) (H1 : ex_filterdiff f F) => match H1 with | @ex_intro _ _ l Hl => ex_intro (fun l0 : U -> V => filterdiff g F l0) l (filterdiff_ext_loc f g l H H0 Hl) end : forall F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop, Filter F -> forall f g : U -> V, F (fun y : U => f y = g y) -> (forall x : U, is_filter_lim F x -> f x = g x) -> ex_filterdiff f F -> ex_filterdiff g F Arguments F, FF are implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [function_scope _ function_scope function_scope _ function_scope _]
filterdiff_continuous = fun (f : U -> V) (x : U) (H : ex_filterdiff f (locally x)) => filterdiff_continuous_aux f H x (fun (P : U -> Prop) (H0 : locally x P) => H0) : forall (f : U -> V) (x : U), ex_filterdiff f (locally x) -> continuous f x Argument scopes are [function_scope _ _]
ex_filterdiff_locally = fun (F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop) (FF : ProperFilter F) (f : U -> V) (x : U) (Fx : is_filter_lim F x) (H : ex_filterdiff f (locally x)) => match H with | @ex_intro _ _ l Df => ex_intro (fun l0 : U -> V => filterdiff f F l0) l (filterdiff_locally f x l Fx Df) end : forall F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop, ProperFilter F -> forall (f : U -> V) (x : U), is_filter_lim F x -> ex_filterdiff f (locally x) -> ex_filterdiff f F Arguments F, FF are implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [function_scope _ function_scope _ _ _]
filterdiff_locally = fun (F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop) (FF : ProperFilter F) (f : U -> V) (x : U) (l : U -> V) (Fx : is_filter_lim F x) (H : filterdiff f (locally x) l) => match H with | conj Hl Df => conj Hl (fun (z : U) (Fz : is_filter_lim F z) => let Df0 : is_domin (locally x) (fun y : U => minus y x) (fun y : U => minus (minus (f y) (f x)) (l (minus y x))) := Df x (fun (P : U -> Prop) (H0 : locally x P) => H0) in (fun H0 : x = z => eq_ind_r (fun x0 : U => is_filter_lim F x0 -> is_domin (locally x0) (fun y : U => minus y x0) (fun...
is_filter_lim_locally_unique : forall x0 y : ?V, is_filter_lim (locally x0) y -> x0 = y where ?K : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K f : U -> V g : U -> V x : U |- AbsRing] ?V : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K f : U -> V g : U -> V x : U |- NormedModule ?K]
filterlim_locally : forall (f0 : ?T -> ?U) (y : ?U), filterlim f0 ?F (locally y) < -> (forall eps : posreal, ?F (fun x0 : ?T => ball y eps (f0 x0))) where ?T : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K f : U -> V g : U -> V x : U |- Type] ?U : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K f : U -> V g : U -> V x : U |- UniformSpace] ?F : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K f : U -> V g : U -> V x : U |- (?T -> Prop) -> Prop] ?FF : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K f : U -> V g : U -> V x : U |- Filter ?F]
filterdiff_ext_loc = fun (F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop) (FF : Filter F) (f g l : U -> V) (H : F (fun y : U => f y = g y)) (H0 : forall x : U, is_filter_lim F x -> f x = g x) (__top_assumption_ : filterdiff f F l) => (fun _evar_0_ : forall (a : is_linear l) (b : forall x : U, is_filter_lim F x -> is_domin F (fun y : U => minus y x) (fun y : U => minus (minus (f y) (f x)) (l (minus y x)))), (fun _ : is_linear l /\ (forall x : U, is_filter_lim F x -> is_domin F (fun y : U => minus y x) (fun y : U => minus (minus (f y) (f x)) (l (minus y x)))) => filterdiff g F l) (conj...
filterlim_locally_ball_norm = fun (K : AbsRing) (T : Type) (U : NormedModule K) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop) (FF : Filter F) (f : T -> U) (y : U) => conj (fun (Cf : filterlim f F (locally y)) (eps : posreal) => Cf (fun x : U => ball_norm y eps x) (locally_le_locally_norm y (fun x : U => ball_norm y eps x) (locally_norm_ball_norm y eps))) (fun Cf : forall eps : posreal, F (fun x : T => ball_norm y eps (f x)) => filterlim_filter_le_2 f (locally_norm_le_locally y) (fun (P : U -> Prop) (H : locally_norm y P) => match H with | @ex_intro _ _ eps He => filter_imp (ball_norm y eps) P (fun t : U => He t) (Cf eps) end...
is_filter_lim_locally_close : forall x0 y : ?T, is_filter_lim (locally x0) y -> close x0 y where ?T : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K f : U -> V g : U -> V x : U |- UniformSpace]
filterlim_norm = fun (K : AbsRing) (V : NormedModule K) (x : V) => filterlim_filter_le_1 norm (locally_le_locally_norm x) (let H : forall (f : V -> R_UniformSpace) (y : R_UniformSpace), (forall eps : posreal, locally_norm x (fun x0 : V => ball y eps (f x0))) -> filterlim f (locally_norm x) (locally y) := fun (f : V -> R_UniformSpace) (y : R_UniformSpace) => match filterlim_locally f y with | conj _ x1 => x1 end in H norm (norm x) (fun eps : posreal => ex_intro (fun eps0 : posreal => forall y : V, ball_norm x eps0 y -> ball (norm x) eps (norm y)) eps (fun (y : V) (Hy : ball_norm x eps y) => Rle_lt_trans (abs (minus (norm y) (...
locally_ex_dec : forall (x0 : ?T) (P : ?T -> Prop), (forall x : ?T, P x \/ ~ P x) -> locally x0 P -> {d : posreal | forall y : ?T, ball x0 d y -> P y} where ?T : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K f : U -> V g : U -> V x : U |- UniformSpace]
filterlim_const : forall a : ?U, filterlim (fun _ : ?T => a) ?F (locally a) where ?T : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K f : U -> V g : U -> V x : U |- Type] ?U : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K f : U -> V g : U -> V x : U |- UniformSpace] ?F : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K f : U -> V g : U -> V x : U |- (?T -> Prop) -> Prop] ?FF : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K f : U -> V g : U -> V x : U |- Filter ?F]
ball_norm_eq : forall x0 y : ?V, (forall eps : posreal, ball_norm x0 eps y) -> x0 = y where ?K : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K f : U -> V g : U -> V x : U |- AbsRing] ?V : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K f : U -> V g : U -> V x : U |- NormedModule ?K]
scal_minus_distr_r : forall (x0 y : ?K) (u : ?V), scal (minus x0 y) u = minus (scal x0 u) (scal y u) where ?K : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K f : U -> V g : U -> V x : U |- Ring] ?V : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K f : U -> V g : U -> V x : U |- ModuleSpace ?K]
filterlim_norm_zero = fun (U : Type) (K : AbsRing) (V : NormedModule K) (F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop) (FF : Filter F) (f : U -> V) (Hf : filterlim (fun x : U => norm (f x)) F (locally 0)) => let H : forall (f0 : U -> V) (y : V), (forall eps : posreal, F (fun x : U => ball_norm y eps (f0 x))) ->...-> filterlim f F (locally zero) Arguments U, K, V, F, FF are implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _ function_scope _ function_scope _]
eq_close : forall x0 y : ?V, close x0 y -> x0 = y where ?K : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K f : U -> V g : U -> V x : U |- AbsRing] ?V : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K f : U -> V g : U -> V x : U |- NormedModule ?K]
norm_triangle : forall x0 y : ?V, norm (plus x0 y) <= norm x0 + norm y where ?K : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K f : U -> V g : U -> V x : U |- AbsRing] ?V : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K f : U -> V g : U -> V x : U |- NormedModule ?K]
norm_triangle_inv : forall x0 y : ?V, Rabs (norm x0 - norm y) <= norm (minus x0 y) where ?K : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K f : U -> V g : U -> V x : U |- AbsRing] ?V : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K f : U -> V g : U -> V x : U |- NormedModule ?K]
bounded_continuity : forall (f0 : R -> ?V) (a b : R), (forall x0 : R, a <= x0 <= b -> filterlim f0 (locally x0) (locally (f0 x0))) -> {M : R | forall x0 : R, a <= x0 <= b -> norm (f0 x0) < M} where ?K : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K f : U -> V g : U -> V x : U |- AbsRing] ?V : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K f : U -> V g : U -> V x : U |- NormedModule ?K]
locally_norm_le_locally : forall x0 : ?V, filter_le (locally_norm x0) (locally x0) where ?K : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K f : U -> V g : U -> V x : U |- AbsRing] ?V : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K f : U -> V g : U -> V x : U |- NormedModule ?K]
locally_le_locally_norm : forall x0 : ?V, filter_le (locally x0) (locally_norm x0) where ?K : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K f : U -> V g : U -> V x : U |- AbsRing] ?V : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K f : U -> V g : U -> V x : U |- NormedModule ?K]
filterlim_locally_unique = fun (T : Type) (K : AbsRing) (V : NormedModule K) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop) (FF : ProperFilter' F) (f : T -> V) (x y : V) => is_filter_lim_unique x y : forall (T : Type) (K : AbsRing) (V : NormedModule K) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop), ProperFilter' F -> forall (f : T -> V) (x y : V), filterlim f F (locally x) -> filterlim f F (locally y) -> x = y Arguments T, K, V, F, FF are implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _ function_scope _ function_scope _ _ _ _]
plus_assoc : forall x0 y z : ?G, plus x0 (plus y z) = plus (plus x0 y) z where ?G : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K f : U -> V g : U -> V x : U |- AbelianGroup]
opp_plus : forall x0 y : ?G, opp (plus x0 y) = plus (opp x0) (opp y) where ?G : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K f : U -> V g : U -> V x : U |- AbelianGroup]
C0_extension_le : forall (f0 : R -> ?T) (a b : R), (forall c : R, a <= c <= b -> filterlim f0 (locally c) (locally (f0 c))) -> {g0 : R -> ?T | (forall c : R_UniformSpace, filterlim g0 (locally c) (locally (g0 c))) /\ (forall c : R, a <= c <= b -> g0 c = f0 c)} where ?T : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K f : U -> V g : U -> V x : U |- UniformSpace]
filterlim_comp_2 : forall (f0 : ?T -> ?U) (g0 : ?T -> ?V) (h : ?U -> ?V -> ?W), filterlim f0 ?F ?G -> filterlim g0 ?F ?H -> filterlim (fun x0 : ?U * ?V => h (fst x0) (snd x0)) (filter_prod ?G ?H) ?I -> filterlim (fun x : ?T => h (f0 x) (g0 x)) ?F ?I where ?T : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K f : U -> V g : U -> V x : U |- Type] ?U : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K f : U -> V g : U ->...-> V x : U |- Filter ?F]
filter_and : forall P Q : ?T -> Prop, ?F P -> ?F Q -> ?F (fun x : ?T => P x /\ Q x) where ?T : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K f : U -> V g : U -> V x : U |- Type] ?F : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K f : U -> V g : U -> V x : U |- (?T -> Prop) -> Prop] ?Filter : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K f : U -> V g : U -> V x : U |- Filter ?F]
ball_norm_sym : forall (x0 y : ?V) (eps : posreal), ball_norm x0 eps y -> ball_norm y eps x0 where ?K : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K f : U -> V g : U -> V x : U |- AbsRing] ?V : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K f : U -> V g : U -> V x : U |- NormedModule ?K]
norm_compat1 : forall (x0 y : ?V) (eps : R), norm (minus y x0) < eps -> ball x0 eps y where ?K : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K f : U -> V g : U -> V x : U |- AbsRing] ?V : [K : AbsRing U : NormedModule K V : NormedModule K f : U -> V g : U -> V x : U |- NormedModule ?K]
